mapper.select: SELECT i.index_name, user schema_name,i.table_name, ic.column_name, i.uniqueness FROM user_indexes i JOIN user_ind_columns ic ON i.index_name = ic.index_name ORDER BY i.index_name, ic.column_position

SELECT rnum, apply_no, apply_date, m_name, schema_name, idx_name, apply_obj, apply_type, approval_status FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, apply_no, apply_date, m_name, schema_name, idx_name, apply_obj, apply_type, approval_status FROM ( SELECT a.apply_no, a.apply_date, m.m_name, a.schema_name, i.idx_name, a.apply_obj, a.apply_type, a.approval_status FROM apply_list a JOIN member m ON a.m_id = m.m_id JOIN apply_index i ON i.apply_no = a.apply_no ORDER BY a.apply_date DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNo} ) WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNo}

SELECT a.apply_date, a.compl_date, m.m_name, a.dba_name, i.idx_name, a.schema_name, t.table_id, i.ref_column, i.is_unique, a.apply_reason, a.reject_reason, a.approval_status, a.query FROM apply_list a JOIN member m ON m.m_id = a.m_id JOIN apply_index i ON i.apply_no = a.apply_no JOIN tables t ON t.table_no = i.table_no WHERE a.apply_no = #{applyNo}
SELECT count(*) FROM apply_list a WHERE apply_obj = 'INDEX'
